masterFinding.verificationInstructions:
Verification Instructions

Check if web services responses contain somewhat sensitive information that is not displayed in the user interface and may not be supposed to be accessible to web services users.

Reporting Requirements
  1. Show user interface / data available to users

  2. Show server response that contains sensitive information that should not be returned to users
masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Ensure that server-side authorization checks are performed, and only information that the user is authorized to view is returned in the server response.
masterFinding.name: Information Disclosure - Web Service Response
masterFinding.businessImpact: Sensitive information in web services responses may allow users to gain access to information that they are not authorized to view.
masterFinding.description: The web service response contains information that is not displayed in the user interface.
